content.text:
# 2nd People's Choice Awards

The '''2nd People's Choice Awards, honoring the best in popular culture for 1975, were held in 1976. They were broadcast on CBS.
Appearances
*Jack Albertson
*Henry Fonda
*Tony Curtis
*Burt Lancaster
*Captain & Tennille
*George Burns
*Army Archerd
*Bea Arthur
*James Stewart
*Rod Steiger
*Roy Scheider

*Lee Grant
*Brenda Vaccaro
*Henry Winkler
*Bonnie Franklin
*Gabe Kaplan
*Raymond Burr
*Ronee Blakley
*Earl Holliman
*James Brolin
*Maximilian Schell
*Glen Campbell
*Sally Kellerman
*Hal Linden
*Karen Black
*Olivia de Havilland
*Ann-Margret
*Robert Mitchum
*Pam Grier
*Kirk Douglas
*George Burns
*James Coburn
*Morris Albert
Awards
Winners are listed first, in bold.
